questions.question: What is the main advantage of storing a digital credential on the blockchain instead of a traditional database?
options: It makes the credential look more impressive
It prevents anyone from altering or faking the credential
It allows the university to charge higher fees
It automatically renews the credential every year

questions.question: What does it mean when a credential is "stamped" on the blockchain?
options: The credential is converted into a physical certificate
The file is hashed and timestamped on the blockchain, creating a permanent proof of authenticity
The credential is uploaded to social media for sharing
The credential’s design is updated automatically

questions.question: How can blockchain-based digital credentials help prevent fraud?
options: By using complicated passwords
By relying on paper signatures
By creating an immutable record that verifies when and by whom a document was issued
By hiding credentials from public view

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the benefit for institutions using blockchain credentials?
options: They can issue unlimited fake diplomas
They can demonstrate transparency and trust in their academic or professional records
They can avoid ever updating their systems again
They no longer need to verify student identities

questions.question: Why is blockchain considered especially valuable in the age of AI and deepfakes?
options: Because AI automatically checks blockchain records
Because blockchain can prove when and by whom digital content originated, even if AI tries to manipulate it
Because blockchain replaces all forms of AI
Because AI and blockchain are the same technology

questions.question: What does it mean that blockchain credentials are decentralized?
options: They’re stored in one secure corporate database
No single company or organization controls the records, so credentials remain accessible even if a provider shuts down
Each university must host its own blockchain from scratch
They can only be viewed through a special app
